channel.title: I need help with 562 source player combat animations (GFX's), Please help me
channel.description:
[b]Note[/b]: Please do not rudely tell me to use the search bar to find this because I have done over [b]30[/b] searches for it without any luck.
[b]Source currently used[/b]: Mezzyscape 562 loading 657 source
I noticed all of the proper melee attack styles are messed up on this source. Such as when I go and attack a monster my character's torso will become invisible for a second. Also magic and range style attack emotes seem incorrect also. However I have downloaded a list of all the common 562 GFX's. If anyone can please get back to me on where I can plug in the proper GFX codes it would be greatly appreciated!
